title: Maruti Suzuki's annual sales volume crosses 2 million units
description: Maruti Suzuki India's Q4 net profit rose by 47.8% to Rs 3,877.8 crore. Annual sales exceeded 2 million units, with a record dividend proposal of Rs 125 per share. The company remains the top passenger vehicle exporter in India.
